title: Drawing, "Woman seated alone at a Table with Reserved Sign", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
signed: Signed in pen and white ink: Malman.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, on sign: Reserved.
description: Woman seated alone at a restaurant table with large sign on it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Woman seated alone at a Table with Reserved Sign", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-23.
